speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, as chairman of the Committee on the Budget, pursuant to section 313 of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974, I submit to the Senate the following list of reconciliation provisions considered to be extraneous under the Byrd rule, to be printed in the Record.
Provisions of the Conference Report Accompanying H.R. 2669, the College Access and Cost Reduction Act, Which Are Extraneous Pursuant to the Byrd Rule
